content.question: A code segment, which you will write, should process the string songInfo and print the song title and artist name separated by the string (" by ").For example, if songInfo is "Carrie Ferriero-Greatest Hits-Tell Me Why", then the code segment should print "Tell Me Why by Carrie Ferriero".As another example, if songInfo is "Aniita-Mixtape 2-How Much More", then the code segment should print "How Much More by Aniita". Write a code segment to print the intended output. Your implementation must conform to the examples.

frqParts.text: A code segment, which you will write, should process the string songInfo and print the song title and artist name separated by the string (" by ").For example, if songInfo is "Carrie Ferriero-Greatest Hits-Tell Me Why", then the code segment should print "Tell Me Why by Carrie Ferriero".As another example, if songInfo is "Aniita-Mixtape 2-How Much More", then the code segment should print "How Much More by Aniita". Write a code segment to print the intended output. Your implementation must conform to the examples.

skill.text: 2.A: Write program code to implement an algorithm.
